text: IFK Askersund is a sports club in the town of Askersund in Sweden. It was established on 1 February 1895. It runs soccer activity. The club has also scored bandy successes. The bandy team played nine seasons in the Swedish top division between 1945 and 1964-1965. == References == ==Other websites== *IFK Askersund Category:1895 establishments in Europe Category:Bandy clubs in Sweden Category:Swedish football clubs Category:1890s establishments in Sweden
title: IFK Askersund
